messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] i forgot
messages.msgSnippet: elana weisberg wrote: I forgot, does anyone here have any experience with on-line publishing? Our daughter, Chloe 10, has written a great story An Alien in
messages.messageBody:
elana weisberg wrote:

I forgot, does anyone here have any experience with on-line publishing? Our
daughter, Chloe 10, has written a great story "An Alien in the Bathroom" and
we were interested in finding out ways of "sharing" this with others. I also
had received (a while back) a link to a homeschoolers on line newspaper
written by kids in Arizona, anyone know more about it? I need to learn more
about computers so I can save this info for later dates!! Someone homeschool
me, please!
elana
hs. ashley 13, jason 11, chloe 10 and gavrielle 3 1/2


________________________________


Was it this one you were talking about?
I passes this info along to some homeschool friends of ours who started writing a story for it right away.

Karin




Homeschool Kids Magazine
Update 16 January 2002
----------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------------------

Hello everyone,

I thought I'd send you a newsletter to let you know the latest
regarding our very first issue (due February 1st)!

We have about 7 poems and 5 stories so far. However, please don't
forget to share what you are doing in unit studies, or your favourite
math problem or recipe. Plus we have a new category for jokes! We
also need items for beauty (including inner beauty), and fashion.
Plus arts & crafts and hobbies. Get those items in now! We're
waiting!

Looking forward to your eager and enthusiastic response!

Mrs T.
Editor
http://www.geocities.com/homeschool_kids_magazine



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.messageBody:
I forgot, does anyone here have any experience with on-line publishing? Our
daughter, Chloe 10, has written a great story "An Alien in the Bathroom" and
we were interested in finding out ways of "sharing" this with others. I also
had received (a while back) a link to a homeschoolers on line newspaper
written by kids in Arizona, anyone know more about it? I need to learn more
about computers so I can save this info for later dates!! Someone homeschool
me, please!
elana
hs. ashley 13, jason 11, chloe 10 and gavrielle 3 1/2
